message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to come down to $100?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $110.
I appreciate you working with me, Alice.  How about we split the difference and do $105?
I'm glad we're close, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I can offer it to you for $115.
